==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しょく|ば|yomi=j}}

===Etymology===
Given the mixed Sinitic-Japanese reading, probably coined in Japan as a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しょくば|職|tr1=shoku|t1=employment, trade, job|pos1=''on'yomi'', from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょくば}}|場|tr2=ba|t2=place, site|pos2=''kun'yomi'', from {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=しょくば}}}}.
